sentences.sContent: The new Focus will be built on one platform and will have the same engine, transmission, chassis and main body in all the markets where it is sold.
sentences.sContent_eng: The new Focus will be built on one platform and will have the same engine, transmission, chassis and main body in all the markets where it is sold.
sentences.sCn: 新款福克斯将会在一个制造平台生产，在所有销售市场所在地配备相同的引擎，动力传送器，底盘与车身。

sentences.sContent: But an 'oversteery' chassis helps the driver to turn into a corner and, at the limit of adhesion, enables a skilled driver to carry far more speed through a corner than understeer.
sentences.sContent_eng: But an 'oversteery' chassis helps the driver to turn into a corner and, at the limit of adhesion, enables a skilled driver to carry far more speed through a corner than understeer.
sentences.sCn: 但是过多转向特性的底盘可以让驾驶员快速进弯，并且在处于附着极限时，过多转向可以让技术高超的驾驶员比不足转向更快的过弯。

phrases.pCn: 底盘测功机；框架测力计；惯性模拟系统；底盘动力计

trans.tranOther: the frame on which the body, engine, wheels etc of a vehicle are built
